li.label: moderate expectations
li.description: I can make do with what I have for now. It'll get better soon.

li.label: low expectations
li.description: The situation is bleak, but maybe it will get better one day.

li.label: very low expectations
li.description: My goal is to survive. Anything nicer than that is just fortunate.

li.label: extremely low expectations
li.description: I'm lucky to be alive. I can't expect anything more.

li.label: in darkness
li.description: It's so dark. Can't we get a little light?

li.label: cabin fever (mild)
li.description: I'm going crazy in here! I need some fresh air!

li.label: cabin fever (serious)
li.description: I can't take being stuck inside any longer! Let me out!

li.label: wearing worn-out apparel
li.description: My outfit is looking pretty bad. Can't I get something decent to wear?

li.label: wearing tattered apparel
li.description: I'm wearing a tattered piece of trash. Can't I get something decent to wear?

li.label: dead man's {0}
li.description: I am wearing apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.

li.label: dead man's {0} (+1)
li.description: I am wearing two pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.

li.label: dead man's {0} (+2)
li.description: I am wearing three pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.

li.label: dead man's {0} etc
li.description: I am wearing more than three pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.

li.label: human leather {0}
li.description: Wearing human leather is disturbing. Who could do this?

li.label: human leather {0} (+1)
li.description: I'm dressed like an insane person.

li.label: human leather {0} (+2)
li.description: I think there may be a face on my clothes...

li.label: human leather {0} etc
li.description: I look like a freak from a horror show, and I feel like I'm in a horror show.

li.label: human leather {0}
li.description: They wear and eat animals, I wear and eat people. What?

li.label: human leather {0} (+1)
li.description: Wearing the skin of humans just feels...right.

li.label: human leather {0} (+2)
li.description: Humans are no better than animals. Why shouldn't I wear their skin?

li.label: human leather {0} etc
li.description: I finally have clothes that really suit me.

li.label: sick
li.description: I don't feel so well...

li.label: cold
li.description: I'm too cold.

li.label: very cold
li.description: So cold...I have to get warm soon.

li.label: freezing
li.description: F-f-freezing. I have to get warm, now!

li.label: hot
li.description: I'm too hot.

li.label: very hot
li.description: It's way too hot!

li.label: extremely hot
li.description: It's so hot I can't stand it! I'm starting to feel delirious!

li.label: burning up
li.description: I'm burning up! Am I dying? I must be!
